General.Name: Inner Mongolia Xingye Mining Co Ltd
General.Description: Inner Mongolia Xingye Silver &Tin Mining Co.,Ltd engages in mining, extracting, and smelting non-ferrous and precious metals. It also offers lead, zinc, silver, copper, tin, iron, bismuth, tungsten, and other non-ferrous metals. The company was formerly known as Inner Mongolia Xingye Mining Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Inner Mongolia Xingye Silver &Tin Mining Co.,Ltd in June 2023. Inner Mongolia Xingye Silver &Tin Mining Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in Chifeng, China.

1.Name: Mr. Zhang  Bin
1.Title: Deputy GM & Head of the Securities Department
